tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BiodiversityData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name TEXT,
    habitat_type TEXT,
    conservation_status TEXT,
    crop_pollination BOOLEAN
)
CREATE TABLE Biodiversity (id INT, species_name VARCHAR(255), species_type VARCHAR(255), habitat_type VARCHAR(255), endangered BOOLEAN)
CREATE TABLE HabitatConservation (id INT, habitat_name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), conservation_status VARCHAR(255), area_in_ha DECIMAL(10,2)
CREATE TABLE CropPollination (id INT, crop_name VARCHAR(255), pollinator_species VARCHAR(255), pollination_rate DECIMAL(5,2), date_last_pollinated DATE)
CREATE TABLE Farmer (id INT, farmer_name VARCHAR(255), farm_location VARCHAR(255), crops_grown VARCHAR(255), membership_status BOOLEAN)
CREATE TABLE FarmingActivities (id INT, activity_name VARCHAR(255), activity_date DATE, activity_type VARCHAR(255), activity_notes TEXT)
